title: Implement slashing interchange format tests for teku

body: Awesome, will `maySignAttestation`/`maySignBlock` also remember the signed message by updating the watermark?
we can sign and do that where tests need it.. the one i looked at didn't require it, I figure these are the details to work through as we implement the framework...
The test runner spec (in the README) says that you should sign every time, probably simpler to do that than try to do it case by case

We'll read it i promise, i was just doing a POC, without looking at details so that I could get an idea of how much was involved..
